org.apache.nutch.searcher

Class Hit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.searcher.Hit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Hit>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class Hit
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, java.lang.Comparable<Hit>
    A document which matched a query in an index.
